entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -7.8°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
